alert.note: Alert for Gallatin; Madison (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 8:05PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Madison and northwestern Gallatin Counties through 845 PM MDT... At 803 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Harrison, or 24 miles northeast of Sheridan, moving northeast at 40 mph. In addition, a cold front was moving east across the area with associated showers and shift to gusty west or southwest winds. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Virginia City, Three Forks, Manhattan, Pony, Harrison, Norris, Mcallister, Missouri Headwaters State Park, Logan, Amsterdam, Trident, Church Hill, Willow Creek and Madison Buffalo Jump State Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between mile markers 277 and 294. Highway 287 between mile markers 51 and 82, and between mile markers 90 and 97. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
